article_title: Doctors Strengthen Ties To Nurse Practitioners As Care Teams Proliferate

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: More than half of the nation’s family physicians say they include nurse practitioners on their care teams, but admit they are lacking when it comes to working with behavioral specialists like psychologists and social workers. A new analysis by the Robert Graham Center, an affiliate of the American Academy of Family [...]
